about.title: About Me
description: Originally from Tunisia and currently based in France, my name is Nader Chatti, I'm a passionate Fullstack developer and software engineer with a Master's degree, specializing in modern web technologies and software architecture.
Currently focused on freelance work and building SaaS products, I combine my multicultural background with technical expertise to create efficient and scalable solutions.

aidiagme.description: Development of an AI based platform that allows patients to get detailed diagnosis of medical analyzes, scanners and personality tests, etc.

renovationDevis.description: A web app that allows to get a detailed renovation estimate for renovation, development and construction of a house.

mhm.description: Development of a matching platform for hotels and travelers allowing them to find the perfect match.

vasta.description: Development of a web and mobile app allowing scheduling, appointment management, reports, and anomaly management to replace the old paper-based system.

deepBridge.description: Development of a deep learning model for the detection of brain tumors. In partnership with the university hospital center of Nice, it allows doctors to detect brain tumors with a deep learning model.

smartHome.description: Development of a smart home platform allowing the control of home appliances through an app and a voice assistant. Make a non-smart home smart using IPX800 hardware and an app.

masters.title: Master's Degree
masters.m2: Master 2 in Mobiquity, Big Data and System Integration
masters.m1: Master 1 in Computerized Methods Applied to Business Management

bachelors.title: Bachelor's Degree
